title: ketogenic diet for dogs with cancer

json.text:
in this video I'm going to introduce to
you a new diet or a lifestyle which is

called ketogenic diet for dogs all that and 
more coming up hello lover my name

is Saro I'm a dog trainer also educate
dog owners if this is your first time

welcome if you want to have a
well-behaved healthy and happy dog

consider subscribing to my channel and
hit the bell icon as well so you will

get notified as soon as I post my next
video

ketogenic diet or keto diet is a
recently introduced form of diet or

lifestyle for both humans and dogs so
what is ketogenic diet or keto diet the

ketogenic diet is a diet that allows you
to burn your fat off your body the

excess fat and use fat as your primary
fuel it is designed to lower the blood

glucose and induce ketosis so what is
ketosis see cherries are the byproduct

of fat burning in general there are two
types of fuel sources when it comes to

our body or our dog's body one of them
is sugar and the other one is fat when

you break down fat it turns into
by-product called ketone ketosis in

general is the process of burning fat
because fat is a superior fuel for your

brain your heart and your hormones it's
gonna improve your mood your memory and

your energy so why to choose or select
ketogenic diet for your dog the main

reason is because it's
species-appropriate diet for your dog

dogs are naturally carnivores and they
mainly eat fresh meat fresh fat if they

are hunting naturally dogs don't produce
necessary enzymes to deal with starch or

carbohydrates which is very common in
kibble or dry food so what are the

benefits of ketogenic diet there are
many benefits of name just a few of them

it helps with prevention of forming
diseases like cancer and developing

cancer itself it is healthy and natural
easy and simple to feed your dog

help to increase your dog's lifespan
this diet can help to heal and remove

cancer tumors heal with most diseases
including epilepsy and did you know that

50% of dogs over the age of 10 developed
cancer at some point in their life so it

has a lot of benefits it's a great diet
for both dogs and humans there's more to

learn about this ketogenic diet which
I'm going to share in this channel in my

future videos if you want to learn about
this diet and more about dog training

and anything to do with dogs make sure
to subscribe to my channel and hit the

bell icon as well so you will get
notified as soon as I post my next video

if you have any questions and if you
want to comment anything about this diet

or anything dog related make sure to
leave them in the comments area and
until next time have fun with your dog
